title: Prairie Vigil · First Glimpse of Anyuan

scenes.description: 画面淡入,展现云雾缭绕的仙域上空,金色卷轴在空中展开,光芒闪动,背景音乐渐起。

visual.composition: Misty immortal skies with a golden scroll unfurling
visual.environment: Immortal realm sky veiled in clouds and golden light
visual.fx: Golden radiance and scroll unfurl effect

scenes.prompt: Xianxia opening, mist-wreathed immortal sky with a golden scroll unfurling, spiritual particles drifting, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 我是云卷仙音,欢迎回来。第5集:草原戒备·安远初见。

scenes.description: 车队冲出沙漠,前方展现无尽灰青草原,所有龟车迅速排成纵列。

visual.composition: The convoy bursts from the desert as endless gray-green prairie stretches ahead

scenes.prompt: The convoy bursts free of the desert into endless ashen grasslands, tortoise carts snapping into tight columns.
scenes.narration: 龟车冲出沙线,面对无边草原时立刻收紧阵形。

scenes.description: 车厢内四女望向草海,面色紧绷,韩立注意到她们的沉默。

visual.composition: Inside the carriage, four women stare toward the grass sea with taut expressions

scenes.prompt: Inside the carriage, four women watch the grass sea with tight faces while Han Li notes their silence.
scenes.narration: 草海一现,四名侍女立刻噤声,神情比沙漠时更紧。

scenes.description: 筌儿挪到韩立身旁,小声讲述方夫人与天东商号的来历。

visual.composition: Quan'er slips beside Han Li, whispering about Madam Fang and the Tiandong firm
visual.character_pose: Han Li listening at close range

scenes.prompt: Quan'er edges next to Han Li and softly recounts Madam Fang's past with the Tiandong trading house.
scenes.narration: 筌儿趁行程絮叨方夫人身世,韩立静听不多言。

scenes.description: 少女谈到商号主人只是凡人,却能掌控三大商号局面。

visual.composition: The girls remark that the caravan master is mortal yet controls three major trading houses

scenes.prompt: They marvel that the caravan's master is merely mortal while commanding three great firms.
scenes.narration: 她们感叹商号主竟是凡人,韩立暗自记下疑点。

scenes.description: 草原上空两名修士轮流巡视,灵光划过天空,让守卫更加紧张。

visual.composition: Two cultivators circle over the prairie in relay, streaks of spiritual light carving the sky

scenes.prompt: Two cultivators patrol above the prairie, spiritual light streaking across the sky and heightening the guards' tension.
scenes.narration: 岣嵝山修士隔阵便出，灵光在空中盘旋警戒，防备妖兽突袭。

scenes.description: 半月后车队冲出草原,前方丘陵出现,所有人长舒一口气。

visual.composition: After half a month the convoy bursts out of the prairie as low hills rise ahead

scenes.prompt: Half a month later, the convoy clears the prairie and distant hills appear, prompting a shared sigh of relief.
scenes.narration: 越过丘陵线的一刻，车队上下都悄悄松气，终于脱离险境。

scenes.description: 香儿拍着胸口感叹躲过草原狼兽,柳儿谈起即将到来的兽潮。

visual.composition: Xiang'er pats her chest in relief over escaping prairie wolves while Liu'er mentions the imminent beast tide

scenes.prompt: Xiang'er pats her chest over dodging prairie wolf packs as Liu'er brings up the beast tide that still awaits.
scenes.narration: 香儿心有余悸,柳儿却提醒真正的兽潮还在前方。

scenes.description: 筌儿聊到安远城高价订购灵具以备兽潮,白衫少女仍旧困惑。

visual.composition: Quan'er explains that Anyuan City is buying spirit tools at high prices to prepare for the beast tide, while the white-robed girl still looks confused

scenes.prompt: Quan'er talks about Anyuan City paying dearly for spirit gear to prepare for the beast tide, yet the white-robed girl remains perplexed.
scenes.narration: 她们猜测小城何以豪购灵具,答案仍不得而知。

scenes.description: 韩立闭目调息,却暗暗记下“兽潮”“蝎潮”的关联。

visual.composition: Han Li sits with eyes closed, quietly noting the link between the beast tide and the scorpion tide
visual.character_pose: Han Li meditating with eyes shut

scenes.prompt: Han Li meditates with eyes closed while secretly committing the connection between the beast and scorpion tides to memory.
scenes.narration: 韩立表面静坐，心里却把兽潮话题牢牢记下，暗自思索对策。

scenes.description: 数日后,高耸石城出现在远方,城墙刻满陌生符纹。

visual.composition: Days later, a towering stone city appears ahead, its walls etched with unfamiliar sigils

scenes.prompt: Several days on, a massive stone city rises in the distance, walls carved with unknown runes.
scenes.narration: 安远城墙高逾三十丈，符纹环绕，远望如铁岭，气势恢宏。

scenes.description: 城楼兵士操控巨弩,弩箭闪烁白光,对车队高度戒备。

visual.composition: Soldiers atop the walls man giant crossbows, white-lit bolts aimed warily at the convoy

scenes.prompt: Wall guards operate massive crossbows whose bolts glimmer white, keeping the convoy under tight watch.
scenes.narration: 巨弩横列,白光闪烁,城卫对任何接近者都严阵以待。

scenes.description: 张奎骑狼到门前,抛出金黄令牌,赵统领示意开启城门。

visual.composition: Zhang Kui rides his wolf to the gate, tossing a golden token as Commander Zhao signals for the doors to open

scenes.prompt: Zhang Kui arrives on his wolf, flips a golden token, and Commander Zhao gestures for the gates to open.
scenes.narration: 张奎亮出令牌,赵统领核对后命人放行但要彻查。

scenes.description: 白袍儒生与青袈裟僧人施法,青霞与黄光依次扫过龟车与骑士。

visual.composition: A scholar in white robes and a monk in cyan kasaya cast spells, blue haze and yellow light sweeping over the carts and riders

scenes.prompt: A white-robed scholar and a monk in cyan robes cast spells, blue radiance and golden light scanning each tortoise cart and rider.
scenes.narration: 修士轮番放出青霞黄光,把三十余车逐一检视。

scenes.description: 检查完成,城门徐开,士兵列队让出通道。

visual.composition: After the inspection the gates ease open while soldiers line up to clear a path

scenes.prompt: With checks complete, the gates open slowly and armored soldiers form ranks to create a corridor.
scenes.narration: 青霞散去后，大门轧然开启，甲士分列两旁，迎接车队入城。

scenes.description: 城内街道人群拥挤,多数凡人背刀持枪,神色凝重。

visual.composition: City streets are jammed with mortals carrying blades and spears, every face solemn

scenes.prompt: Inside the city, crowded streets of armed commoners move past the convoy, each bearing a grave expression.
scenes.narration: 街道被背刀百姓塞满,人人脸色沉重,城中气氛压抑。

scenes.description: 龟车在戒备仓库前停靠,侍卫与官员开始点收兵器与灵具。

visual.composition: Tortoise carts dock before the guarded warehouse while guards and officials inventory weapons and spirit gear

scenes.prompt: The tortoise carts stop outside the secured depot as guards and clerks begin counting weapons and spirit tools.
scenes.narration: 货物逐箱交接，张奎办完手续后才真正松懈，任务终于完成。

scenes.description: 韩立提出想独自在城中转转,张奎点头但郑重交代注意安全。

visual.composition: Han Li asks to wander the city alone while Zhang Kui nods and solemnly cautions him

scenes.prompt: Han Li asks to explore the city on his own, and Zhang Kui agrees but warns him to stay alert.
scenes.narration: 韩立告辞去逛城,张奎虽准许仍再三叮嘱勿久留。

scenes.description: 韩立独行街头,仰望天空七轮白日,暗自感叹灵界灵气浓郁却无法吸纳。

visual.composition: Han Li walks alone through the streets, gazing up at seven blazing suns
visual.environment: Spirit-rich skies with seven suns he cannot draw from
visual.character_pose: Han Li moving alone through the city
visual.fx: Dense spiritual qi that remains inaccessible

scenes.prompt: Han Li walks the city alone, looking up at seven white suns and lamenting that he cannot absorb the realm's abundant qi.
scenes.narration: 他行走街巷,望着七轮白日,只恨体内禁制难吸灵气。

scenes.description: 在兵器铺内把玩虬龙索,店伙计殷勤介绍,韩立显露炼体士气度。

visual.composition: Inside the weapon shop he plays with a coiled dragon rope while the clerk enthusiastically explains
visual.character_pose: Han Li revealing the bearing of a body cultivator

scenes.prompt: In the armory shop Han Li tests the curled dragon rope as the clerk eagerly touts it, showing his body-cultivator poise.
scenes.narration: 他随手抖直虬龙索,伙计立刻看出是真正的炼体士。

scenes.description: 韩立跟随两名陌生炼体士到僻巷,试验地蛟筋并爽快付出灵石。

visual.composition: Han Li follows two unfamiliar body cultivators into a secluded alley, tests the earth flood-dragon tendon, and pays without hesitation
visual.character_pose: Han Li walking with the strangers into the alley

scenes.prompt: Han Li trails two unknown body cultivators into a hidden lane, tests the earth flood-dragon sinew, and hands over spirit stones readily.
scenes.narration: 他试过地蛟筋后痛快掏出灵石,换来随身暗器的好材料。

scenes.description: 画面淡出,夜色下的仙城剪影,天空洒落灵光,画面逐渐变暗。

visual.composition: Nighttime silhouette of the immortal city as spiritual light rains from the sky
visual.environment: Night sky, immortal city outline, drifting spirit motes
visual.fx: Falling spirit particles with a fade-out effect

scenes.prompt: Xianxia ending, immortal city silhouette beneath the night sky, spiritual particles drifting down, calm mystical mood, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 下一集再见。我是云卷仙音,原著作者忘语。第6集即将开始。
